com.echopen.asso.echopen.utils

Class AsyncLoader<D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.content.Loader<D>
      • android.support.v4.content.AsyncTaskLoader<D>
        • com.echopen.asso.echopen.utils.AsyncLoader<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - data type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThrowableLoader

    public abstract class AsyncLoader<D>
extends android.support.v4.content.AsyncTaskLoader<D>
    Loader which extends AsyncTaskLoaders and handles caveats as pointed out in http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=14944.

    Based on CursorLoader.java in the Fragment compatibility package Addendum Mehdi B. : for more information, check (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/28710633/difference-between-cursorloader-and-asynctaskloader)
